page.title: 12ELECTRICAL EQUIPMENT
page.content:
If the 19th century has been called the age of steam then the 20th century must be the age of electronics.The following is a list of electrical equipment used daily in almost every home:
Lights,TV,Fridge,Radio,Clocks & watches,Kitchen Utensils,Water Heater.
Almost every home has a washing machine iron,D.I.Y. tools,telephone,sewing machine,vacuum cleaner and hair dryer, which is used at least weekly.Less than half of the homes which we surveyed have computers,electrically controlled central heating,electric cooker,blanket,security alarm, music centre,or video.None of our homes have the video disc player that will be necessary to play the Domesday video disc.
